privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is crucial to us. At {{brand}}, we are committed to protecting the security and confidentiality of your personal data.
privacy.s1Text: {{brand}} is the entity responsible for processing personal data collected through this website, determining the purposes and means of processing, in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.s2Intro: We only collect data essential for providing our real estate services, namely:
s2Items: Contact information (name, email, phone) voluntarily provided through contact forms;
Property preferences (type of property, location, budget) for sending personalized suggestions;
Technical browsing data (IP address, device type, browser) for improving user experience.
privacy.s3Intro: The data collected is intended for:
s3Items: Managing commercial relationships and responding to information or visit requests;
Disclosing real estate opportunities compatible with your profile;
Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations of real estate brokerage activity (AMI License 26172);
Continuous improvement of our services and the website.
privacy.s4Text1: We do not sell your data to third parties. Data sharing occurs only when strictly necessary for closing real estate deals (e.g., Registry Offices, Banks for mortgage credit) or by legal requirement.
privacy.s4Text2: We implement rigorous technical and organizational measures to protect your data against loss, misuse, alteration, or unauthorized access.
privacy.s5Intro: As a data subject, you have the right to:
s5Items: Access, rectify, or request the deletion of your personal data;
Restrict or object to the processing of your data;
Withdraw consent at any time (without compromising the lawfulness of processing carried out based on consent previously given).
privacy.s5Text: To exercise these rights, contact us through the forms available on the website.
privacy.s6Text: We use cookies to optimize site functionality and analyze traffic. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings at any time.
privacy.s7Text: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy periodically. We recommend regularly consulting this page to stay informed.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. Explore the most common questions from our clients.

items.question: How does the property buying process work?
items.answer: The process begins with choosing the property. After that, we make an offer, negotiate values, and upon agreement, sign the Promissory Purchase and Sale Agreement (CPCV). Finally, we carry out the Public Deed, where the property officially passes to your name.

items.question: What documents are needed to sell my property?
items.answer: Generally, you need the Urban Property Booklet, Land Registry Certificate, Usage License, Energy Certificate, Property Plan, and identification documents of the owners.

items.question: Does RibeiraZul handle bank financing?
items.answer: Yes! We have partnerships with several banking entities (such as CGD, Novo Banco, BPI, etc.) and help throughout the checking process, guaranteeing the best conditions for you.

items.question: How long does it take to sell a house?
items.answer: The time varies depending on the market, location, and price. However, our team uses advanced marketing strategies to ensure maximum exposure and sell your property in the shortest possible time.

items.question: Do you only do brokerage or also construction?
items.answer: We do both! In addition to real estate brokerage, we have a team specialized in construction and renovation, allowing us to offer turnkey solutions for those buying houses in need of intervention.

faq.supportText: If you didn't find the answer you were looking for, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
